page.title: 14Polsue Manor Farm
page.content: Polsue Manor Farm is actually mentioned in the original Domesday Book.The farmer owns sheep,pigs, cows, horses and hens. He rents the farm from Tregothnan Estate.It is 161 acres.He mainly farms sheep he has Black Heads ,Dorsets and Texel rams.He marks their backs with green and blue sprays. The green indicates that they are to be sold and the blue indicates that they are to be kept. He also keeps some cows. They are mainly fresians. he sells them to private owners or to the Truro market His son owns some boars which are kept on the farm.He breeds them for bacon. The original farm house of Polsue Manor Farm was knocked down by a wealthy farm owner.
